# loop

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/loop
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T00:05:48.133354

---

In programming, a loop is a sequence of instructions that repeats until a condition is met.

In [Patchwork](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite-creative/fortnite-creative-glossary#patchwork), a loop is a musical sequence that repeats.
